main.name: Mohammed Qamar
main.description: Pursuing my passion to create intuitive experiences that will generate a positive impact on people's lives with design and game-focused applications
main.bio: An Experienced student currently obtaining a Bachelors of Game Design at Brock University. Currently, I am an Independent Game Developer and Advertise on Social Media platforms. Still eagerly awaiting new opportunities.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions please ontact me using the form below!

resume.skillmessage: Below are my up to date skills and statistics.

education.description: Currently attending Brock University, so far I have aquired skills in 3D modelling, 2D digital design concepts using industry grade software.
Attending George Brown College, I worked on creating 2D game assets to develop enviornments and sprite sheet concepts.

work.title: Assistant Media Buyer
work.description: I currently employed in an E-Commerce advertising business where my duties included product research, editing advertisements and designing logos, as well as launching them on social media platforms such as Snapchat, Instagram, and Facebook

work.title: Game Developer
work.description: Currently I am an Indie Developer, my duties have included Level Design, 3D Artistry, UX Design, Programming, Marketing and Sound Engineering.

projects.title: Marlaboro
projects.category: Developed as a 3D FFS, MarlaBoro was the first big project that I developed for Qam Games

projects.title: Noches
projects.category: a game that I worked on expirementing with the 2D development in Unity

projects.title: SketchFab
projects.category: Some of my 3D Models created with 3DS Max

projects.title: Artstation
projects.category: A collection of my digital Art, uploaded to Artstation

testimonials.text: Although Mohammed was hired for media buying position, Mohammed went above and beyond with his role by developing excellent creatives/angles all while managing high budget media buying campaigns. Mohammed has a natural talent for all things creatives and is great with graphic designing. Mohammed has an abstract way of problem solving often times thinking of angles for campaigns in an innovative way.
From what I gather, Mohammed is trying not just to create games, but create experiences that provide impact for the player and provide them with perspective.
